ing: 1 (11.5 ounce) can condensed bean with bacon soup
des: "My mom made this bean dip for us when we were growing up and I never forgot it because of the few ingredients and the amounts were all '1'. Serve with corn chips."
ins: Stir soup, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, onion, and taco seasoning together in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high until hot, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir and microwave again until cheese melts and mixture is bubbling, 3 to 5 minutes more.
